value.name: telexText
value.string: Rerouting message SK 2867 BGO/CPH STD: 1100 UTC (Timetable) re-routed due flow regulations New routing ENBR/EKCH/SAS567- Ats plan filed acc. No restriction on this routing at present time. / CDR must confirm receipt of the rerouting message to CPHOW / via: DATALINK using FLOW CONFIRM or other report to CPHOFSK/ phone +45 3232 5317 / CUT 131.7 KKMSG CPHOWFLOW or SITA CPHOCSK. NOTE/NEW FLT-TIME 0115033BRGDS SAS CENTRAL FLOW MANAGEMENT
